messages.subject: hijikata toshizo + susumu
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, i am a new fan. Is there any sites of anime PMK gallery of hijikata,and susumu? or rather all characters? I have seen good screencaps of souji, however,
messages.messageBody:
Hi, i am a new fan. Is there any sites of anime PMK gallery of
hijikata,and susumu? or rather all characters?

I have seen good screencaps of souji, however, fail to find hijikata
front view gallery or screencaps of anime. can send me links? Thank you
very much.

and hi to all SHQ members.
